org.nvonop.selenium.framework.datagenerator

Class EmailGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nvonop.selenium.framework.datagenerator.EmailGenerator

  • public class EmailGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    nvonop This class is intended to be used for obtaining valid and invalid email addresses.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getEmailAddressMissingAmpersand()
      This method returns the invalid email address "testtest.com" that is missing the ampersand.
      static java.lang.String getEmailAddressMissingDomain()
      This method returns the invalid email address "test@" that is missing its domain.
      static java.lang.String getEmailAddressMissingLocalPart()
      This method returns the invalid email address "test.com" that is missing its local part.
      static java.lang.String getValidEmailAddress()
      This method returns the email address "test@test.com".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
